string-array.name: country
string-array.item: South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands

string-array.name: socialNetworks_longItems
string-array.item: Twitter is an online social networking service that enables users to send and read short 140-character messages called "tweets".
Google+ is an interest-based social network that is owned and operated by Google Inc. The service is Google\'s fourth foray into social networking.

Instagram is an online mobile photo-sharing, video-sharing and social networking service that enables its users to take pictures and videos, and share them on a variety of social networking platforms.
Facebook is an online social networking service headquartered in Menlo Park, California. Its website was launched on February 4, 2004, by Mark Zuckerberg with friends.

resources.string: Sign Up and became a Ranker
Please review at least one criterion
Rate the quality of a service and/or the quality of a product ? This is now possible through RankIt!, do it in privacy and in a single click !
The consumer has the right to be treated with respect
The consumer has the right to be heard
The consumer is entitled to the satisfaction of essential needs
The consumer has the right to security
The consumer has the duty to be informed, ready to inquire
The consumer has the duty to be in solidarity in order to have the force to enforce the rights of all consumers
The consumer has the duty to be active, decided to defend himself when his cause is just
The consumer has a duty to be socially responsible, aware of the influence his behavior may have on other citizens

There are international consumer protection regulations under the United Nations guidelines for consumer protection at the United Nations Conference on Trade and Development (UNCTAD).
For more information, you can get closer to the oragnism in charge of consumer protection in your country.
